content: warm up your look with this cozy one-piece crochet pullover worked seamlessly from the neck down this garment showcases the self-striping texture of caron colorama haze as the soft colors transition effortlessly before your eyes the clever use of granny stitch clusters adds a touch of texture and interest with a full range of sizes it s the perfect gift idea that will keep loved ones warm and stylish materials caron® colorama haze™ 8 oz/227 g 649 yds/593 m sizes xs/s m l fairy gold 92004 2 3 3 balls sizes xl 2/3xl fairy gold 92004 3 4 balls gauge 7 groups of 3-double_crochet and 11 rounds = 6 15 cm in body pat sizes to fit chest measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2xl 48-50 122-127 cm
